eduversum.name: Qcad
eduversum.description: Qcad is a program for two dimensional CAD drawing and because of that it is especially suitable for engineering courses. With qcad you can create technical drawings and plans for buildings, installations, electrical circuits, process schemes, diagrams and mechanical components. With the help button you can call the manual. This is currently available only in English but Qcad is is sufficiently intuitive.
